title: Child receives help during distress
content:
Scenario: Child receives help during distress
    Given Emma is upset about something that happened at school
    When she creates a contribution expressing her distress
    And the guardian agent detects emotional crisis indicators
    Then her parents are immediately notified with sensitivity
    And age-appropriate support resources are surfaced
    And family members can provide comfort and guidance
    And if needed, connection to counseling resources is offered
    And Emma experiences the system as safe space to express feelings
